meanings.definition: Resembling a pine tree in appearance or characteristics.
meanings.sent1: The tall, pinelike structure of the tower stood out against the skyline.
meanings.sent2: The forest was filled with pinelike trees that reached towards the sky.
meanings.sent3: The pinelike lampshade cast a forest of shadows on the wall.
meanings.sent4: Her pinelike voice cut through the noise of the crowded room.
meanings.sent5: The pinelike scent of the air brought back memories of hiking in the woods.

meanings.definition: Having the shape or qualities of a pine tree.
meanings.sent1: The pinelike branches swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: The Christmas tree was decorated with pinelike ornaments and lights.
meanings.sent3: The pinelike pattern on the fabric reminded her of winter holidays.
meanings.sent4: His pinelike posture made him stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The pinelike texture of the bark felt rough against her fingertips.
